title: Sapphire eSports blue looking for assistant coach
body:
Sapphire eSports blue is seeking an assistant coach to help develop and push their competitive team to the next level. We are currently recruiting someone that is wishing to develop analytical skills and learn along the way. You will work alongside the head coach to help develop your understanding of the game at a macro and micro level. 

Requirements
- Able to attend several sets of scrims per week.
- Open minded and willing to learn
- A passion for numbers and looking at LoL beyond it's playing value
- Leadership skills
- Time management
- Organised
- Passion for esports
- Thorough understanding of League of Legends on a macro and micro level
- age 20+

No experience is required, but definitely helps.

If you are interested in the role, please add me in game to set up a trial/meeting ♥

replies.body: je suis désoler de t'avoir mit en colère :C
